docs.snippet: HEYMAN--Lisa, age 47. Oscar Heyman & Brothers mourns the passing of our dear Lisa Heyman on February 25. Lisa will always be remembered as the devoted mother of Roxanne and Ruby, the cherished wife of Larry Gauchman, the beloved daughter of Barbar...
docs.lead_paragraph: HEYMAN--Lisa, age 47. Oscar Heyman & Brothers mourns the passing of our dear Lisa Heyman on February 25. Lisa will always be remembered as the devoted mother of Roxanne and Ruby, the cherished wife of Larry Gauchman, the beloved daughter of Barbara and Marvin, and the loving sister of Jonathan, Ben, and Ruth. We will always remember Lisa's warmth, humor, charm, and especially her devotion to family. Service at King David Cemetery, 101 Mill Street, Putnam Valley, NY, 11am, Wednesday, February 27. Donations to The Amyloidosis Foundation, 7151 North Main Street, Suite 208, Clarkston, Michigan, 48346. Shiva at the home of her husband, Larry, after the service until 7pm, Thursday 3-8pm, Saturday 6-8 pm, and on Sunday, at the home of her mother, Barbara, 3-8pm.

docs.snippet: Brian Boitano, Joan Benoit Samuelson, Oscar De La Hoya and David Robinson head a list of 18 finalists announced Wednesday for the United States Olympic Hall of Fame. The public will select six inductees.Boitano won the gold medal in men’s figure...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brian Boitano, Joan Benoit Samuelson, Oscar De La Hoya and David Robinson head a list of 18 finalists announced Wednesday for the United States Olympic Hall of Fame. The public will select six inductees.Boitano won the gold medal in men’s figure skating in 1988. In 1984, Samuelson won the first Olympic marathon for women. De La Hoya won boxing’s lightweight gold medal in 1992 and Robinson basketball gold medals in 1992 and 1996.The other individual finalists are Greg Barton (kayak), Bruce Baumgartner (wrestling), Jeff Blatnick (wrestling), Valerie Brisco (track and field), Teresa Edwards (basketball), Karch Kiraly (volleyball), Mary T. Meagher (swimming), Sheila Young Ochowicz (speed skating), Darrell Pace (archery), Michael Plumb (equestrian), John Smith (wrestling), Amy Van Dyken (swimming), Peter Westbrook (fencing) and Lones Wigger (shooting).

docs.snippet: Who's hidebound? Research suggests that older people grown more, not less, tolerant....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oscar is 80 years old this year, Jon Stewart said during the Academy Awards show, "which makes him now automatically the front-runner for the Republican nomination."
docs.abstract: Who's hidebound? Research suggests that older people grown more, not less, tolerant.

docs.snippet: The Oscars must be in trouble:The New York Times outdrew them....
docs.lead_paragraph: Believe it or not, 5.6 million of you checked into Movieville and Baggertown on the day after the Oscars, enough traffic so that the entire site of the New York Times drew 37.6 million, a big number that suggests that the dotcom at the House of Many Doors outdrew ... the Oscars.
docs.abstract: The Oscars must be in trouble:The New York Times outdrew them.

docs.snippet: Soft Serve scans newspapers, magazines and Web sites for "soft news" - coverage of products, trends and matters of style. Just the fluff, ma'am. Tilda Swinton may have picked up a red carpet win for Damiani by wearing their diamond cuff, but the j...
docs.lead_paragraph: Soft Serve scans newspapers, magazines and Web sites for "soft news" - coverage of products, trends and matters of style. Just the fluff, ma'am.Tilda Swinton may have picked up a red carpet win for Damiani by wearing their diamond cuff, but the jeweler's Milan showroom wasn't quite so lucky. Seven men dug a tunnel through a neighboring building and stole $20 million worth of jewels... Next year's male Oscar nominees wanting to sport a little bling should check out the diamond cufflinks that Thom Browne has designed for Harry Winston... If real estate is your expense of choice, why not throw down for Michael Jackson's Neverland ranch when it hits the auction block on March 19th... They may not have a theme park, but Curbed's got a list of the top 10 private pools in the city that may make you spring for a new condo... Having trouble waking up in your new pad? Check out this aromatherapy alarm clock that will wake you to favorite scent...Amy Winehouse may not be the freshest fashion icon in music, but her style is unmistakable. Now you can buy a piece of the action when she launches her new clothing and make-up line... A sad day for fans of felonious fashion. Mayor Bloomberg and the NYPD raided and seized $1 million in goods from Canal St. counterfeiters... In Shanghai, the trend is not towards knock-offs, but "the rebirth of individualism"... You'll be hardly alone wearing Marc Jacobs re-launched Hillary tee, but as least it one-up's Senator Clinton's boxy pantsuits... Soft Serve is sick of today's politics. Check us out tomorrow for more of the spin.
docs.abstract: Soft Serve scans newspapers, magazines and Web sites for "soft news" - coverage of products, trends and matters of style. Just the fluff, ma'am. Tilda Swinton may have picked up a red carpet win for Damiani by wearing their diamond cuff, but the jeweler's Milan showroom wasn't quite so lucky. Seven men dug a tunnel [...]
